body_html:
The reason why these are completely rebuilt from scratch is that you have MSBuild running CMake commands like this every time you build:

"C:\Program Files\CMake\bin\cmake.exe" -E copy_directory C:/Users/Kevin/dev/tensorflow-r1.4/tensorflow/core C:/Users/Kevin/dev/tensorflow-r1.4/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/build/tf_python/tensorflow/include/tensorflow/core
body_text:
The reason why these are completely rebuilt from scratch is that you have MSBuild running CMake commands like this every time you build:
"C:\Program Files\CMake\bin\cmake.exe" -E copy_directory C:/Users/Kevin/dev/tensorflow-r1.4/tensorflow/core C:/Users/Kevin/dev/tensorflow-r1.4/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/build/tf_python/tensorflow/include/tensorflow/core
body:
The reason why these are completely rebuilt from scratch is that you have MSBuild running CMake commands like this every time you build:
```
"C:\Program Files\CMake\bin\cmake.exe" -E copy_directory C:/Users/Kevin/dev/tensorflow-r1.4/tensorflow/core C:/Users/Kevin/dev/tensorflow-r1.4/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/build/tf_python/tensorflow/include/tensorflow/core
```
